title: Cannot log into league after just playing
body: So, this accountb IM able to log into on the forums but i can't seem to log into the game itself.. says my password is wrong and i even changed to see and it still says it's wrong? i JUST played two games restarted my computer and now it won't let me in? any advice?

replies.body:
I've noticed this weird login thing cropping up more and more over the weekend, and while I don't have a 100% certain fix just yet I know some players have been able to get back in by forcing a repatch. It almost seems like some clients didn't grab the patch correctly, so now the client won't let you sign in because it's sort of behind a patch. 

Do me a favor and grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a *Force Repatch*. Hit me back up and let me know if that helped or not!!
Same issue and I lost ranked points.  How did I get those restored since its on you Rito?

Same issue.  Just had a remake because the game wouldnt launch after champ select.  

Tried to re-log and now its saying PW is wrong.  I can also log into the site.
same just happen to me in ranked game for my promos to gold. thanks riot. i know this is on your end not mine. woo failed promo fun
